name: i (DominikaMa3ur)
description:
[PL] Gra o liczbach zespolonych

[EN] A game about complex numbers

[ES] Un juego sobre números complejos

[RU] Игра про комплексные числа

[DE] Ein Computerspiel über komplexen Zahlen

🌱⌨️ Klawiatura/Keyboard/Teclado/Клавиатура/Tastatur:
[ 1 ] = + i
[ 2 ] = · (1 + i)
[ 3 ] = · (1 - i)
[ 4 ] = · i
[ 5 ] = z²
[ 6 ] = (0, 0)

🌼 Made during Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1
it is not real = complex numbers aren't real numbers
